welcome.title: Welcome to Arena of Betrayal
welcome.description: A blockchain-based Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma tournament powered by Fully Homomorphic Encryption.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy
privacy.description: Your strategy is encrypted and never revealed to other players

fairness.title: Provable Fairness
fairness.description: All game logic runs on-chain with verifiable results

strategic.title: Strategic Depth
strategic.description: Build complex conditional strategies that adapt to opponents

strategy.title: Build Your Strategy
strategy.entryFeeDescription: You need to pay 0.01 ETH to submit your strategy and join the tournament. Top 30% of players will share the prize pool!
strategy.howItWorksDescription: Create conditional rules for your strategy. Each rule checks a condition and performs an action. Rules are evaluated in order. If no rule matches, the default action is used.
strategy.submittedDescription: Your strategy is encrypted with FHE and stored on-chain
strategy.cannotEditDescription: Once submitted, your strategy is locked and cannot be changed. This ensures fair play for all participants.
strategy.noRules: No conditional rules. Using default action only.
strategy.privacyNote: While you can view your own strategy here, it remains encrypted on-chain. Other players cannot see your strategy until the tournament ends.
strategy.encryptionNote: Your strategy will be encrypted using Zama FHE (Fully Homomorphic Encryption) before being stored on-chain. Complete privacy guaranteed - even the owner cannot see strategies until tournament reveal!

controls.title: Tournament Controls
controls.submitStrategyFirst: Submit your strategy first to participate in voting
controls.autoStart: Tournament auto-starts when {{count}} votes reached (50% quorum)
controls.lowerRoundsNote: Lower rounds = less gas. Recommended: 50 for 4+ players

payoff.title: Payoff Matrix
payoff.description: Points earned per round based on both players' choices
payoff.winnersDescription: Top 30% of players by total score
payoff.distributionDescription: Progressive rewards (1st place gets the most)
payoff.exampleDescription: With 10 players, top 3 share the 0.1 ETH prize pool

common.metaMaskTip: Make sure MetaMask is connected to Sepolia Testnet
common.contractTip: Check if contract address is correct in .env.local
common.internetTip: Verify you have a stable internet connection

players.title: Tournament Participants
players.noPlayers: No players have joined yet. Be the first to submit a strategy!
players.fheDescription: All strategies are encrypted with Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE). You can see encrypted data on-chain, but the actual strategy remains hidden until the tournament completes!

errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient ETH. You need at least 0.01 ETH + gas fees.
errors.gasFailed: Gas estimation failed. Try with fewer rules or contact support.

about.title: About the Game
about.customStrategiesDescription: Build your own strategy using conditional rules. Define when to cooperate or defect based on game state.
about.unlimitedPlayersDescription: No player limit! The more players join, the more interesting the tournament becomes.
about.roundRobinDescription: Every player faces every other player in the tournament. Total fairness guaranteed.
about.fheEncryptionDescription: Strategies encrypted with Zama's Fully Homomorphic Encryption. Complete privacy until tournament reveal.
about.daoGovernanceDescription: Tournament starts via decentralized voting. 50% quorum required - each player gets one vote!
